<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="&#47700;&#53440;&#47928;&#51088;">&#47700;&#53440;&#47928;&#51088;<a class="anchor-link" href="#&#47700;&#53440;&#47928;&#51088;"> </a></h3><blockquote><p>메타문자란 원래 그 문자가 가진 뜻이 아닌 특별한 용도로 사용하는 문자</p>
</blockquote>
<p><code>. ^ $ * + ? {} [] \ | ()</code></p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="&#47928;&#51088;-&#53364;&#47000;&#49828;-[]">&#47928;&#51088; &#53364;&#47000;&#49828; []<a class="anchor-link" href="#&#47928;&#51088;-&#53364;&#47000;&#49828;-[]"> </a></h4><blockquote><p>[ ] 사이의 문자들과 매치라는 의미. [ ] 사이에는 어떤 문자도 들어갈 수 있다.</p>
</blockquote>
<h5 id="&#48152;&#45824;-&#47928;&#51088;-^">&#48152;&#45824; &#47928;&#51088; ^<a class="anchor-link" href="#&#48152;&#45824;-&#47928;&#51088;-^"> </a></h5><blockquote><p>반대라는 의미를 가진 메타문자</p>
</blockquote>
<ul>
<li>example<ol>
<li>[^abc] :abc가 아닌 문자    2. [^1-9] : 숫자가 아닌 문자</li>
</ol>
</li>
</ul>
<ul>
<li>example<ol>
<li>[abc] : a,b,c중 한개의 문자와 매치</li>
<li>[a-f] : a와 f사이의 범위, [abcdef]와 동일한 의미를 갖는다.(From - To)</li>
<li>[a-zA-z] : 알파벳 모두</li>
<li>[0-9] : 숫자</li>
<li>[\d] : 숫자와 매치, [0-9]와 동일한 표현</li>
<li>[\D] : 숫자가 아닌 것과 매치, [^0-9]와 동일한 표현</li>
<li>[\s] : whitespace 문자와 매치, [ \t\n\r\f\v]와 동일한 표현식</li>
<li>[\S] : whitespace 문자가 아닌 것과 매치, [^ \t\n\r\f\v]와 동일한 표현식</li>
<li>[\w] : 문자 + 숫자(alphanumeric)와 매치, [a-zA-Z0-9_]와 동일한 표현식</li>
<li>[\W] : 문자 + 숫자(alphanumeric)가 아닌 문자와 매치, [^a-zA-Z0-9_]</li>
</ol>
</li>
</ul>
<h4 id="Dot(.)">Dot(.)<a class="anchor-link" href="#Dot(.)"> </a></h4><blockquote><p>\n을 제외한 모든 문자와 매치(re.DOTALL은 \n도 매치)</p>
</blockquote>
<ul>
<li>example<ol>
<li>a.b :a+ 모든 문자 + b (a[.]b는 문자(.)을 의미하고 메타문자(.)을 의미하지 않는다)    </li>
</ol>
</li>
</ul>
<h4 id="&#48152;&#48373;(-*)">&#48152;&#48373;( *)<a class="anchor-link" href="#&#48152;&#48373;(-*)"> </a></h4><blockquote><ul>
<li>바로 앞에 있는 문자가 0부터 무한번 반복됨을 뜻함</li>
</ul>
</blockquote>
<ul>
<li>example<ol>
<li>ca*t :c와 t사이에 a가 0에서 무한번 반복        1. ct : true<ol>
<li>cat : true</li>
<li>caat : true</li>
</ol>
</li>
</ol>
</li>
</ul>
<h4 id="&#48152;&#48373;(+)">&#48152;&#48373;(+)<a class="anchor-link" href="#&#48152;&#48373;(+)"> </a></h4><blockquote><ul>
<li>바로 앞에 있는 문자가 1부터 무한번 반복됨을 뜻함</li>
</ul>
</blockquote>
<ul>
<li>example<ol>
<li>ca+t :c와 t사이에 a가 1에서 무한번 반복        1. ct : false<ol>
<li>cat : true</li>
<li>caat : true</li>
</ol>
</li>
</ol>
</li>
</ul>
<h4 id="&#48152;&#48373;-({m,-n},-?)">&#48152;&#48373; ({m, n}, ?)<a class="anchor-link" href="#&#48152;&#48373;-({m,-n},-?)"> </a></h4><blockquote><p>{m,n} m번에서 n번 반복되는 경우 / ?는 {0,1}과 같은 의미</p>
</blockquote>
<ul>
<li>example<ol>
<li>{1,} :1번 이상, + 와 같은 의미    2. {0,} : 0번 이상, * 와 같은 의미</li>
<li>ca{2}t : a가 반드시 2번 반복</li>
<li>ca{2,5}t : c + a(2-5회 반복) + t<ol>
<li>cat : false</li>
<li>caat : true</li>
<li>caaaaat : true</li>
<li>caaaaaat : false</li>
</ol>
</li>
<li>ab?c : a + b(있어도 되고 없어도 됨) + c<ol>
<li>abc : true</li>
<li>ac : true</li>
</ol>
</li>
</ol>
</li>
</ul>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="re&#47784;&#46280;">re&#47784;&#46280;<a class="anchor-link" href="#re&#47784;&#46280;"> </a></h3><blockquote><p>python의 re(regular expression)은 기본으로 설치되어있는 모듈이다.</p>
</blockquote>

</div>
</div>
</div>
    {% raw %}
    
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">

<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">re</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
    {% endraw %}

    {% raw %}
    
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">

<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">p</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">re</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">compile</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;ab*&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="c1"># &#39;ab*&#39;가 컴파일된 Pattern object를 반환한다.</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
    {% endraw %}

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="re.complie-&#54876;&#50857;&#54620;-&#47928;&#51088;&#50676;-&#44160;&#49353;-method">re.complie &#54876;&#50857;&#54620; &#47928;&#51088;&#50676; &#44160;&#49353; method<a class="anchor-link" href="#re.complie-&#54876;&#50857;&#54620;-&#47928;&#51088;&#50676;-&#44160;&#49353;-method"> </a></h4><ol>
<li>match() : 문자열의 처음부터 정규식과 매치되는지 조사</li>
<li>search() : 문자열 전체를 검색하여 정규식과 매치되는지 조사</li>
<li>findall() : 정규식과 매치되는 모든 문자열(substring)을 리스트로 반환함</li>
<li>finditer() : 정규식과 매치되는 모든 문자열(substring)을 iterable한 객체로 반환함</li>
</ol>
<ul>
<li>match, search는 주어지는 문자열이 정규식과 매칭되면 match객체를 반환하고, 매칭되지 않을 때는 None을 반환함</li>
</ul>

</div>
</div>
</div>
    {% raw %}
    
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">

<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">p</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">re</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">compile</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;[a-z]+&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="c1"># 모든 영어소문자가 1번이상 반복되는 패턴</span>
<span class="n">p</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
    {% endraw %}

</div>

<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="re.Match-&#44061;&#52404;&#51032;-method">re.Match &#44061;&#52404;&#51032; method<a class="anchor-link" href="#re.Match-&#44061;&#52404;&#51032;-method"> </a></h4><ol>
<li>group() : 매치된 문자열을 반환</li>
<li>start() : 매치된 문자열의 시작 위치를 반환</li>
<li>end() : 매치된 문자열의 끝 위치를 반환</li>
<li>span() : 매치된 문자열의 (시작, 끝)에 해당하는 튜플을 반환</li>
</ol>

</div>
</div>
</div>
    {% raw %}
    
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">

<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">m</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">p</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">match</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;python&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">m</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">group</span><span class="p">()</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>

<div class="output_wrapper">

<h5 id="&#47784;&#46280;&#45800;&#50948;-&#49688;&#54665;">&#47784;&#46280;&#45800;&#50948; &#49688;&#54665;<a class="anchor-link" href="#&#47784;&#46280;&#45800;&#50948;-&#49688;&#54665;"> </a></h5>
</div>
</div>
</div>
    {% raw %}
    
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">

<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">p</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">re</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">compile</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;[a-z]+&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">m</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">p</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">match</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;python&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
    {% endraw %}

    {% raw %}
    
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">

<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">m</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">re</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">match</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;[a-z]+&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;python&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="c1"># 위의 두줄의 코드와 같은 기능</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
    {% endraw %}

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="&#52980;&#54028;&#51068;-&#50741;&#49496;">&#52980;&#54028;&#51068; &#50741;&#49496;<a class="anchor-link" href="#&#52980;&#54028;&#51068;-&#50741;&#49496;"> </a></h4><blockquote><p>re를 이용하여 정규식을 컴파일할 때 여러 옵션을 사용할 수 있다.</p>
</blockquote>
<ol>
<li>DOTALL(S) - <code>.</code>이 줄바꿈 문자를 포함하여 모든 문자와 매치할 수 있도록 함.</li>
<li>IGNORECASE(I) - 대소문자에 관계없이 매치할 수 있도록 함</li>
<li>MULTILINE(M) - 여러줄과 매치할 수 있도록 함(<code>^</code>, <code>$</code> 메타문자의 사용과 관계가 있는 옵션)</li>
<li>VERBOSE(X) - verbose모드를 사용할 수 있도록 함. (정규식을 보기 편하게 만들수 있고 주석등을 사용할 수 있음)</li>
</ol>
<ul>
<li>약어사용 :re.DOTALL과 re.S는 같은 뜻</li>
</ul>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h5 id="DOTALL,-S">DOTALL, S<a class="anchor-link" href="#DOTALL,-S"> </a></h5>
</div>
</div>
</div>
    {% raw %}
    
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">

<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">p</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">re</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">compile</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;a.b&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">m</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">p</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">match</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;a</span><span class="se">\n</span><span class="s1">b&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="c1"># DOTALL옵션을 사용하지 않으면 메타문자 . 은 공백문자에 매칭되지 않음 </span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">m</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">

<div class="output_area">

<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>None
</pre>
</div>
</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
    {% endraw %}

    {% raw %}
    
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">

<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">p</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">re</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">compile</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;a.b&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">re</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DOTALL</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">m</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">p</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">match</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;a</span><span class="se">\n</span><span class="s1">b&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="c1"># DOTALL옵션을 사용하면 메타문자 . 은 공백문자에 매칭됨, </span>
<span class="c1"># 여러줄로 이루어진 문자열에서 \n에 상관없이 매칭되도록 만들기 위해 자주 사용됨</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">m</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">

<div class="output_area">

<pre>&lt;re.Match object; span=(0, 3), match=&#39;a\nb&#39;&gt;
</pre>
</div>
</div>

</div>
</div>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h5 id="MULTILINE,-M">MULTILINE, M<a class="anchor-link" href="#MULTILINE,-M"> </a></h5><ul>
<li>re.compile에서 [ ]안이 아닌 밖에서 ^이나 $가 사용되면 ^는 문자열의 처음을 의미하고 $는 마지막을 의미한다.<ul>
<li>^python : 문자열이 반드시 python으로 시작해야 매치된다</li>
<li>$python : 문자열이 반드시 python으로 끝나야 매치된다</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>

</div>
</div>
</div>
    {% raw %}
    
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">

<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">p</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">re</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">compile</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;^python\s\w+&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="c1"># python으로 시작 + 공백 하나 + 문자 하나이상</span>

<span class="n">data</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">&quot;&quot;&quot;python one</span>
<span class="s2">life is too short</span>
<span class="s2">python two</span>
<span class="s2">you need python</span>
<span class="s2">python tree&quot;&quot;&quot;</span>

<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">p</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">findall</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data</span><span class="p">))</span> <span class="c1"># ^ 에 의해 python이 사용된 첫 줄만 매칭됨, 여러줄을 보기위해서는 re.MULTILINE옵션을 사용해야함</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">

<div class="output_area">

<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>[&#39;python one&#39;]
</pre>
</div>
</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
    {% endraw %}

    {% raw %}
    
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">

<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">p</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">re</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">compile</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;^python\s\w+&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">re</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">M</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="c1"># python으로 시작 + 공백 하나 + 문자 하나이상</span>

<span class="n">data</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">&quot;&quot;&quot;python one</span>
<span class="s2">life is too short</span>
<span class="s2">python two</span>
<span class="s2">you need python</span>
<span class="s2">python tree&quot;&quot;&quot;</span>

<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">p</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">findall</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data</span><span class="p">))</span> <span class="c1"># re.M 옵션을 통해 각 줄마다 패턴을 조사한 후 매치되는 문자열을 반환</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">

<div class="output_area">

<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>[&#39;python one&#39;, &#39;python two&#39;, &#39;python tree&#39;]
</pre>
</div>
</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
    {% endraw %}

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h5 id="VERBOSE,-X">VERBOSE, X<a class="anchor-link" href="#VERBOSE,-X"> </a></h5>
</div>
</div>
</div>
    {% raw %}
    
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">

<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">charref</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">re</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">compile</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="sa">r</span><span class="s1">&#39;&amp;[#](0[0-7]+|[0-9]+|x[0-9a-fA-F]+);&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="c1"># 해석이 잘 되지않음</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
    {% endraw %}

    {% raw %}
    
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">

<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">charref</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">re</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">compile</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="sa">r</span><span class="s2">&quot;&quot;&quot;</span>
<span class="s2">&amp;[#] # Start of a numeric entity reference</span>
<span class="s2">(</span>
<span class="s2">    0[0-7]+ # Octal form</span>
<span class="s2">    | [0-9]+ # Decimal form</span>
<span class="s2">    | x[0-9a-fA-F]+ # Hexadecimal form</span>
<span class="s2">)</span>
<span class="s2">; # Trailing semicolon</span>
<span class="s2">&quot;&quot;&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">re</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">VERBOSE</span><span class="p">)</span> 
<span class="c1"># re.VERBOSE 옵션을 사용하면 정규표현식안에서 공백문자와 줄별로 주석을 사용할 수 있음, 컴파일될 때 공백과 주석은 사라지고 컴파일됨</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
    {% endraw %}

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="&#48177;&#49836;&#47000;&#49884;">&#48177;&#49836;&#47000;&#49884;<a class="anchor-link" href="#&#48177;&#49836;&#47000;&#49884;"> </a></h3><ul>
<li>파이썬의 리터럴 규칙으로 인해 \를 문자열에 포함시키기 위해서는 \와 같이 추가 \로 이스케이프 처리해야한다.</li>
<li>위와같은 작업은 귀찮기 때문에 r''을 사용하면 이스케이프 처리해주지 않아도 된다.</li>
</ul>
<p><strong>Raw string임을 알려주는 기호 <code>r</code></strong></p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
    {% raw %}
    
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">

<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">p</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">re</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">compile</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;</span><span class="se">\\\\</span><span class="s1">section&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
    {% endraw %}

    {% raw %}
    
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">

<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">p</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">re</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">compile</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="sa">r</span><span class="s1">&#39;</span><span class="se">\\</span><span class="s1">section&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="c1"># 위의 코드의 같은 표현</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
    {% endraw %}

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<hr>
<ul>
<li><strong>위에서 살펴본 메타문자들은 매치가 진행될 때 현재 매치되고 있는 문자열의 위치가 변경된다. 소비된다라고도 표현하는데 나의 이해로는 패턴과 문자열이 매칭되면 match객체의 group으로 들어가는지 안들어가는지가 소비된다 안된다의 기준인 듯하다..</strong></li>
</ul>
<h4 id="|">|<a class="anchor-link" href="#|"> </a></h4><blockquote><p>or과 동일한 의미로 사용됨</p>
</blockquote>

</div>
</div>
</div>
    {% raw %}
    
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">

<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">p</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">re</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">compile</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;Crow|Servo&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="c1"># Crow또는 Servo</span>
<span class="n">m</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">p</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">match</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;CrowHello&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">m</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">

<div class="output_area">

<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>&lt;re.Match object; span=(0, 4), match=&#39;Crow&#39;&gt;
</pre>
</div>
</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
    {% endraw %}

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="^">^<a class="anchor-link" href="#^"> </a></h4><blockquote><p>문자열의 맨 처음</p>
</blockquote>

</div>
</div>
</div>
    {% raw %}
    
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">

<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">re</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">search</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;short$&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;life is too short, you need python&#39;</span><span class="p">))</span>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="\A">\A<a class="anchor-link" href="#\A"> </a></h4><blockquote><p>문자열의 처음이지만 MULTILINE 옵션이 주어질 때도 문자열 전체의 처음하고만 매치됨</p>
</blockquote>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="\Z">\Z<a class="anchor-link" href="#\Z"> </a></h4><blockquote><p>문자열의 끝이지만 MULTILINE 옵션이 주어질 때도 문자열 전체의 끝하고만 매치됨</p>
</blockquote>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="\b">\b<a class="anchor-link" href="#\b"> </a></h4><blockquote><p>단어구분자(whitespace)</p>

<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">p</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">search</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;no class at all&#39;</span><span class="p">))</span>

<h3 id="&#44536;&#47336;&#54609;">&#44536;&#47336;&#54609;<a class="anchor-link" href="#&#44536;&#47336;&#54609;"> </a></h3><blockquote><p>문자그룹이 반복되는지 조사하기 위한 기능</p>
</blockquote>
<ul>
<li>example<ol>
<li>(ABC)+ :ABC가 1번 이상 반복</li>
</ol>
</li>
</ul>

</div>
</div>
</div>
    {% raw %}
    
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">

    <div class="input_area">

<span class="n">m</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">p</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">search</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;ABCABCABC OK?&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">m</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">

<div class="output_area">

<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>&lt;re.Match object; span=(0, 9), match=&#39;ABCABCABC&#39;&gt;
</pre>
</div>
</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
    {% endraw %}

    {% raw %}
    
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">

<h5 id="&#44536;&#47336;&#54609;&#46108;-&#47928;&#51088;&#50676;-&#51116;&#52280;&#51312;&#54616;&#44592;">&#44536;&#47336;&#54609;&#46108; &#47928;&#51088;&#50676; &#51116;&#52280;&#51312;&#54616;&#44592;<a class="anchor-link" href="#&#44536;&#47336;&#54609;&#46108;-&#47928;&#51088;&#50676;-&#51116;&#52280;&#51312;&#54616;&#44592;"> </a></h5>
</div>
</div>

    {% raw %}
    
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">

<span class="n">p</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">search</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;Paris in the the spring&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">group</span><span class="p">()</span>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h5 id="&#44536;&#47336;&#54609;&#46108;-&#47928;&#51088;&#50676;&#50640;-&#51060;&#47492;-&#48537;&#51060;&#44592;">&#44536;&#47336;&#54609;&#46108; &#47928;&#51088;&#50676;&#50640; &#51060;&#47492; &#48537;&#51060;&#44592;<a class="anchor-link" href="#&#44536;&#47336;&#54609;&#46108;-&#47928;&#51088;&#50676;&#50640;-&#51060;&#47492;-&#48537;&#51060;&#44592;"> </a></h5><blockquote><p>(?P<그룹명>...)</p>
</blockquote>

</div>
</div>
</div>
    {% raw %}
    
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">

<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">p</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">re</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">compile</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="sa">r</span><span class="s1">&#39;(?P&lt;name&gt;\w+)\s+((\d+)[-]\d+[-]\d+)&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">m</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">p</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">search</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;park 010-1234-1234&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">m</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">group</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;name&#39;</span><span class="p">))</span> <span class="c1"># 이름으로 인덱싱하기</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">

<div class="output_area">

<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>park
</pre>
</div>
</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
    {% endraw %}

    {% raw %}
    
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">

<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">p</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">re</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">compile</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="sa">r</span><span class="s1">&#39;(?P&lt;word&gt;\b\w+)\s+(?P=word)&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="c1"># 정규식안에서 이름으로 참조가능</span>
<span class="n">m</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">p</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">search</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;konkuk in the the spring&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">m</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">group</span><span class="p">())</span> <span class="c1"># 이름으로 인덱싱하기</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">

<div class="output_area">

<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>the the
</pre>
</div>
</div>

    {% endraw %}

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="&#51204;&#48169;&#53456;&#49353;">&#51204;&#48169;&#53456;&#49353;<a class="anchor-link" href="#&#51204;&#48169;&#53456;&#49353;"> </a></h3><h4 id="&#44557;&#51221;&#54805;-&#51204;&#48169;-&#53456;&#49353;">&#44557;&#51221;&#54805; &#51204;&#48169; &#53456;&#49353;<a class="anchor-link" href="#&#44557;&#51221;&#54805;-&#51204;&#48169;-&#53456;&#49353;"> </a></h4><blockquote><p>(?=...) :...에 해당되는 정규식과 매치 되어야하며 조건이 통과되어도 문자열이 소비되지 않음</p>
<h4 id="&#48512;&#51221;&#54805;-&#51204;&#48169;-&#53456;&#49353;">&#48512;&#51221;&#54805; &#51204;&#48169; &#53456;&#49353;<a class="anchor-link" href="#&#48512;&#51221;&#54805;-&#51204;&#48169;-&#53456;&#49353;"> </a></h4><p>(?!...) :...에 해당되는 정규식과 매치 되지 않아야하며 조건이 통과되어도 문자열이 소비되지 않음</p>
</blockquote>

</div>
</div>
</div>
    {% raw %}
    
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">

<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">p</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">re</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">compile</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;.+:&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">m</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">p</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">search</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;http://google.com&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">m</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">group</span><span class="p">())</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">

<div class="output_area">

<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>http:
</pre>
</div>
</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
    {% endraw %}

    {% raw %}
    
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">

<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">

<span class="n">m</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">p</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">search</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;http://google.com&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">m</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">group</span><span class="p">())</span> <span class="c1"># :이 소비되지 않기 때문에 group으로 나오지 않음</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<span class="n">p</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sub</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;colour&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;blue socks and red shoes&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="c1"># 컴파일된 패턴에 매치되는 문자열을 &#39;colour&#39;로 바꿈</span>

<h4 id="sub-method-&#49324;&#50857;-&#49884;-&#52280;&#51312;-&#44396;&#47928;-&#49324;&#50857;">sub method &#49324;&#50857; &#49884; &#52280;&#51312; &#44396;&#47928; &#49324;&#50857;<a class="anchor-link" href="#sub-method-&#49324;&#50857;-&#49884;-&#52280;&#51312;-&#44396;&#47928;-&#49324;&#50857;"> </a></h4><blockquote><p>\g<그룹이름></p>

<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">p</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sub</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;\g&lt;phone&gt; \g&lt;name&gt;&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">&quot;park 010-1234-1234&quot;</span><span class="p">))</span> <span class="c1"># 주어지는 문자열 탐색후 그룹핑에 매치되는 문자열을 참조를 통해 가져옴?</span>

<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">p</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sub</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;\g&lt;2&gt; \g&lt;1&gt;&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">&quot;park 010-1234-1234&quot;</span><span class="p">))</span> <span class="c1"># 주어지는 문자열 탐색후 그룹핑에 매치되는 문자열을 참조를 통해 가져옴, 숫자 인덱스로도 가능</span>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="sub-&#47700;&#49436;&#46020;&#51032;-&#47588;&#44060;&#48320;&#49688;&#47196;-&#54632;&#49688;-&#45347;&#44592;">sub &#47700;&#49436;&#46020;&#51032; &#47588;&#44060;&#48320;&#49688;&#47196; &#54632;&#49688; &#45347;&#44592;<a class="anchor-link" href="#sub-&#47700;&#49436;&#46020;&#51032;-&#47588;&#44060;&#48320;&#49688;&#47196;-&#54632;&#49688;-&#45347;&#44592;"> </a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
    {% raw %}
    
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">

<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">hexrepl</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">match</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="n">value</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">int</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">match</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">group</span><span class="p">())</span>
    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nb">hex</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">value</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">p</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">re</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">compile</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="sa">r</span><span class="s1">&#39;\d+&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">p</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sub</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">hexrepl</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;call 1234 for printing, 562342 for user code&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="c1"># 컴파일된 패턴과 매치된 match 객체를 함수의 인자로 넘겨주고 처리됨</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">

<div class="output_area">



<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>&#39;call 0x4d2 for printing, 0x894a6 for user code&#39;</pre>
</div>

</div>

</div>
</div>

<span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">s</span><span class="p">)</span>
